extendedInfo.description: Riding the Chicago CTA buses is cool. With Chicago Transit Tracker, you can create and track an unlimited number of routes, and see your closest route based on your location. View CTA system maps, and follow CTA alerts, quickly and easily. Used by more riders than any other transit app in Chicago.NEW!  Lite version and Pro version have the SAME FEATURES! Upgrade to Pro to remove the ads.There's no better tool for exploring and getting around Chicago than the Chicago Transit Authority. But with more than 140 bus and train routes covering 2,230 route miles, the system itself can be a challenge to learn.  Chicago Transit Tracker can help ensure that you get the most out of the CTA."I think this is the greatest app ever" -C.R.Features:-Real-time Bus and Train Trackers!-Add and organize multiple 'L' and Bus routes in My Routes-Reorder, group and organize those routes into groups for each access-Map predicted buses on your route with a single tap-Save (export) your list of routes to backup, and load (import) them from backup. Simply go to Settings to save or load your list. Great for when you need to reinstall your app or upgrade to Pro!-Closest Routes lookup based on your location (limited to a single route in Lite version)-Alarms to tell you when to walk out the door-CTA Alerts-Smooth flashing indicators to alert you of changes-Filter by name when creating route-System maps-Report crashes to us to improve your experiences down the roadWhy Pro vs. Lite?- The Pro version removes ads.

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.comment: Its so great that it gives you the right times.....when it wants to. It works a good 20 to 25% of the time, which being from Chicago, that\'s not good at all; it might as well not exist. The main problems I\'ve experienced so far are times where it says 20 minutes till the next bus, when in fact, 2 other buses arrive before the projected time; it stalls meaning nothing shows up, or it just doesn\'t work. I am using the free service; I can\'t imagine what the paid service is like. Good job CTA, good job
reviews.author: Robert Rivera

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Why this is great. 2 reasons. 1 it displays all your route and there arival times on one screen. This lets me change my route effortlessly. Other app force you to view arival times, one by one 2 it lets you change route names. Makes veiwing the screen easyer
reviews.author: Veye Bliss

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great app!
reviews.author: Jen Lea

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Seems accurate!! My only wish is Pace buses as an option...
reviews.author: Dustyn Adams

reviews.title: Can\'t find me
reviews.comment: Whenever I look up buses by closest stops, it puts me miles from where I am. Other transit trackers much more accurate.
reviews.author: Gabrielle Slough-Cummings

reviews.title: Get your timea right
reviews.comment: Times are always way off. Used multiple days at multiple stops and not once were the times correct.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: This app us great for traveling around the city. It has always gotten me to places on time. It needs a next train function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app to track the transit routes. Really useful for visitors
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Times can be off
reviews.comment: Said train was running 6 minutes early which never happens, started walking towards train and said I had 7 minutes, then changed to 18 minutes and was late to work. Not to reliable.
reviews.author: jason gust

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Fast arrivals times. Relaible for the most part. Used daily!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Accurate. Some times it hangs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage.
reviews.comment: Wrong three times in a row. 6 minutes for bus before I got off the train. Walked out of the terminal and it said 7 minutes till bus. Doesn\'t make sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs Update
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t show some routes/stops that have been changed over the last year. Specifically the 115 Pullman.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It rly helps 90% of the time.

reviews.title: Needs to be more accurate
reviews.comment: Tells you bus is coming later than it actually is. Have missed the bus a couple times because of this bad app.

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: Love it !

reviews.title: Boo!
reviews.comment: Made me late for work. Not accurate.

reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: A little slow on the route update.

reviews.title: Accurate
reviews.comment: It wks according to cta  schedule. I think its accurate 95 percent of the time. The other 5 percent it says that it cannot fetch times....
